Camel

Camel is a numerical and symbolic mathematics library for C. It provides various mathematical functions and utilities.

Functions

Function Name

Function Description

Parameters

  • Parameter 1: Description
  • Parameter 2: Description

Return Value

Return Value Description

Example

pub fn main() void {
    // Compute factorial of 5
    const n = 5;
    comptime var factorial = 1;
    for (0..n) |i| {
        factorial *= i;
    }
    std.debug.print("Factorial of {} is {}\n", .{ n, factorial });
}
